strDesc: A power pack designed for an EVA suit's custom requirements. Powers air circulation, vitals monitoring, and other attendant functions.

A small canister used by EVA suits. Designed to contain oxygen, a gas consumed by humans, highly prized due to its rarity in solar colonies.

As it's also a critical component of fire, water, and - you guessed it - ice, oxygen is a versatile gas with much to recommend it.
Cabling capable of transmitting power between shipboard components. Any engineer worth their salt knows the importance of a good cable run, especially when salvaging damaged starships.
Cabling capable of transmitting power between shipboard components once installed. Any engineer worth their salt knows the importance of a good cable run, especially when salvaging damaged starships.
A drink pouch for rehydrating thirsty spacers on the go. Though, for optimal results, Future Foods recommends consumption while stationary.

The Future Foods Trencher (tm) is a space food staple renowned for its long life and unique flavour. The packaging is a biosolid which is just as technically edible as the contents.

This one is styled 'Kung Pao Chicken', though it couldn't be further from either of those things.

The Future Foods Trencher (tm) is a space food staple renowned for its long life and unique flavour. The packaging is a biosolid which is just as technically edible as the contents.

This one is styled 'Mystery Meat in Surprise Sauce', which among the line's labelling is probably the most honest.
strNameFriendly: Trenchers: Mystery Meat in Surprise Sauce

strDesc:
The Future Foods Trencher (tm) is a space food staple renowned for its long life and unique flavour. The packaging is a biosolid which is just as technically edible as the contents.

This one is styled 'Nacho Fiesta', though it is hard to imagine anything less like a fiesta than its contents.
An Halvorson kit consisting of sealant and semisolid hull substitute. Patch jobs will restore a damaged compartment's means to retain pressure.
A Renbao handheld smart tablet. Will interface with most electronic subsystems, like ship navstations.
A 24-inch Weber 'Pryze' crowbar, useful for leveraging open doors, crates, and fighting a losing battle against incursions from an alien dimension.
A Gott handheld power drill with torque compensator, necessary to install most shipboard components.

An Halvorson Class C portable fire extinguisher, rated for most shipboard emergencies.

Suitable as a bludgeoning tool in some scenarios.
A Weber high-intensity optical tool with adjustable power, focus, and wand attachment. Perfect for a range of jobs from soldering to cutting and welding.

An ubiquitous Phoebus-brand industrial floodlight. Comes with magnetic grip feet.

Crucial to any would-be salvager.

An ubiquitous Phoebus-brand industrial floodlight. Comes with magnetic grip feet.

Crucial to any would-be salvager.
A Renbao handheld smart PDA. Will interface with most electronic subsystems, like ship navstations, or other personal computers.

A hermetically sealed suit capable of protecting the user from hard vacuum with its own onboard air rebreather and 02 tank. Even unpowered it's better than nothing, by about four layers of insulation.

A hermetically sealed suit capable of protecting the user from hard vacuum with its own onboard air rebreather and 02 tank. Even unpowered it's better than nothing, by about four layers of insulation.
The counterpart to the Pathfinder pressure suit. The helmet attaches at the neck with seals rated 'Acceptable' by at least one System standards organisation.

It should go without saying that a hermetically sealed EVA suit is significantly less useful without its helmet. And yet, the ISSB reports that in 55 years of recorded space colonisation, 37 users have entered vacuum without their helmet, in all cases fatally.

A Pathfinder protective suit which will insulate the wearer from hard vacuum, and little else. Caution: air supply is limited to what is trapped inside once sealed, which is usually only a few minutes.
Despite efforts to quash this trend by an alliance of fashion moguls, these brown coats just seem to keep cropping up.

A loose fitting garment covering the whole body, also known as a boilersuit. Wearing one will protect your modesty and little else.

Yellow is sometimes associated with optimism and gaiety; in Xinhua it is the color of prestige. It is also associated with high-visibility maintenance work.

A loose fitting garment covering the whole body, also known as a boilersuit. Wearing one will protect your modesty and little else.

Red is a bold colour, often associated with danger and fire, but also with celebrations and luck. Many spacers are phobic towards red due to a long-standing memetic tradition concerning new crew members.

A loose fitting garment covering the whole body, also known as a boilersuit. Wearing one will protect your modesty and little else.

Green is synonymous with envy, but also fertility and health. It is not a creative color.

A loose fitting garment covering the whole body, also known as a boilersuit. Wearing one will protect your modesty and little else.

Tan is a light brown color tone. Its most noteworthy element is its lack of noteworthiness.

A loose fitting garment covering the whole body, also known as a boilersuit. Wearing one will protect your modesty and little else.

Gray is often situated at a midpoint between the Manichaean light and dark, black and white, a morally neutral or ambivalent color. Grey is unsuitable for a wedding, unless you attend planning to kill someone.
